meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of dinosaurs.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed many dinosaurian fossils.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the dinosaurian bones carefully.
meanings.sent3: The dinosaurian toy looked so realistic that it scared the cat.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were slow and dinosaurian, as if she had stepped out of prehistoric times.
meanings.sent5: The movie used impressive CGI to create a dinosaurian world.

meanings.sent1: The costume designer created a dinosaurian outfit for the play.
meanings.sent2: The lizard had a dinosaurian appearance with its sharp teeth.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with dinosaurian shapes for the birthday party.
meanings.sent4: The old car had a dinosaurian design, looking like a relic from the past.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a mural of a dinosaurian landscape on the wall.

meanings.definition: A member of the group of reptiles that includes dinosaurs.
meanings.sent1: The paleontologist discovered a new dinosaurian species in the desert.
meanings.sent2: The children were excited to learn about the different dinosaurian species.
meanings.sent3: The dinosaurian in the movie was friendly and loved to dance.
meanings.sent4: The dinosaurian at the zoo attracted a lot of visitors with its size.
meanings.sent5: The museum had a life-sized dinosaurian skeleton on display.
